header.title: Ensemble AI
header.tagline: The smartest AI is an ensemble.

free.title: Free Mode
free.description: Bring your own API keys. Completely secure, your keys are encrypted and never leave your browser.

pro.title: Pro Mode
pro.description: Buy credits to get access to the latest models across all providers.

apiKeyConfiguration.heading: Configure API Keys
apiKeyConfiguration.apiKeyInfoBold: Configure an API key to continue.
apiKeyConfiguration.apiKeyInfoNormal: Your keys are stored locally and never sent to our servers.
apiKeyConfiguration.configureMoreOrContinue: Configure more or continue selecting models.

shareDialog.title: Share Results
shareDialog.description: Share your ensemble review with others using this link.

ensembleConfigurationSummary.heading: Your Ensemble Configuration
ensembleConfigurationSummary.description: These models will receive the prompt and contribute to the comparison.

ensembleManagementPanel.quickPresetsDescription: Start from a curated ensemble tuned for common workflows.
ensembleManagementPanel.noPresets: No saved presets yet. Save your first ensemble below to get started.
ensembleManagementPanel.saveDescription: Save this combination for future reviews.
ensembleManagementPanel.saveInfoText: Save your favourite model combinations to load them instantly later.

ensembleSidebar.heading: Ensemble Summary
ensembleSidebar.description: Review your current selections before saving or continuing.
ensembleSidebar.quickPresetsDescription: Start from a curated ensemble tuned for common workflows.
ensembleSidebar.noPresets: No saved presets yet. Save your first ensemble below to get started.
ensembleSidebar.saveDescription: Save this combination for future reviews.
ensembleSidebar.saveInfoText: Save your favourite model combinations to load them instantly later.
ensembleSidebar.manualResponsesDescription: Add reference answers or benchmark outputs to include in the review step.
ensembleSidebar.manualResponsesInfo: Include custom responses to compare against live model outputs.
ensembleSidebar.manualResponsesNote: Add reference answers or benchmark outputs to compare against live model responses.

manualResponseModal.title: Manual Response
manualResponseModal.description: Enter a manual response for the current prompt

settingsModal.title: Settings
settingsModal.description: Configure your application preferences including theme, language, and data management
settingsModal.clearConfirmMessage: Are you sure? This will permanently delete all your settings, API keys, and saved ensembles.

prompt.title: Enter Your Prompt
prompt.description: Your prompt will be sent to all selected models in your ensemble
prompt.tipsDescription: Small adjustments often lead to noticeably more aligned outputs.
prompt.tip1: Be specific and clear about the desired outcome.
prompt.tip2: Provide context, examples, or constraints when they matter.
prompt.tip3: Experiment with tone: analytical, conversational, or creative.
prompt.tip4: Iterate on length and structure to probe different behaviours.

review.title: Review Responses
review.description: Compare responses from your ensemble of AI models
review.noResponses: No responses yet. Responses will appear here when models complete.
